document_data.mainbody:
Samir was a talented blacksmith from the city of Neverwinter, active some time before the late 14 century DR.
Samir befriended a famous armor crafter from the planar City of Brass, Gisnervi, after the brassworker was banished from the Elemental Plane of Fire in disgrace. Sometime before the , Samir managed to break a curse placed on a set of magic armor created by Gisnervi, causing his exile. With the storm armor restored, so was Gisnervis reputation.
